headline: PTOE Corporation Confirms Cyberattack: Official Website Hijacked and Redirected to Chinese Malware Domain
summary: Sheridan, WY, Oct. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PTOE Corporation today confirmed that its official website, https://www.ptoe.com, was compromised and temporarily replaced with a fraudulent Chinese shopping website loaded with malware. The breach occurred on the evening of October 7, when PTOE’s monitoring systems and GoDaddy detected unauthorized DNS modifications and sudden downtime. Within hours, PTOE’s cybersecurity partner Sucuri Security launched a full remediation operation. The hijacked d

headline: GoDaddy’s Quarterly Earnings Preview: What You Need to Know
summary: GoDaddy is set to report its third-quarter results by the end of the month, and analysts project a double-digit rise in its earnings.
